title: Kinship's Bond
opening: Eliwood travels westward to meet with Uther, the marquess of Ostia. They pass through Laus and continue through two more territories. After a time, they arrive at a fortress separating Thria and Ostia.

The group travels west to meet with Lord Uther, the marquess of Ostia. Lord Uther is an intelligent leader and power in the Lycian League. He has also been a father to Hector, ever since their parents died many years ago. Hector's reunion with his brother is a happy one, if somewhat embarrassing. Hector continues his journey filled with complex emotions. At length, they arrive at a fortress that separates Thria and Ostia.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Jaffar. Ursula. Lloyd. Linus. That's everyone, is it not? If I have you, the Four Fangs, together, I need no one else. I have need of you to eliminate a man whose living plagues me. His name is Eliwood, a noble of Pherae.

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: ...Pherae's located in Lycia, is it not?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: That's right. But he is no simple country lord. He has friends. Other Lycian lords. Individually, they are no match for you, and yet... Carelessness invites death.

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: Do not make that mistake.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Lloyd, Linus... I have work for you, the Reed brothers, as well. All right?

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: One question. Are these our father's ord--I mean... the orders of the head of the Black Fang?

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Hee hee... Why, naturally. Isn't that right, my beloved?

intro.speaker: Brendan
intro.line: Mmm... Ah...yes.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: There! Are you satisfied? Remove Eliwood. Your orders come from the head of the Black Fang, Brendan Reed. As members of this group, you will follow that order, yes? Or...does your opponent frighten you into immobility, Lloyd?

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: Sonia! How dare you speak to my brother in such a...

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: Linus.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: ...I know.

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: Sonia, we do not need to be chastised by you. Under our father, we are the ones who've carried out the law of the Fang. If Eliwood is an evil person, there is no reason for us to hesitate.

intro.speaker: Linus
intro.line: The Fang lets none escape.

intro.speaker: Lloyd
intro.line: We, the brothers Reed, dispense the Fang's justice.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: ......Ursula, Jaffar, you understand your orders, yes? Once you find the target, you eliminate him at once!

intro.speaker: Ursula
intro.line: It will be as you say, Lady Sonia. Anything for you.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: ...I've received my orders. I will do my duty.

intro.speaker: Sonia
intro.line: Your target's name is Eliwood, noble of Pherae! Bring him down. On the Black Fang's honor!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: ...I've heard word from my brother. He's already on his way here. We're to wait for him.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Lord Uther is coming here himself?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: So it appears. I told you of this before, but Castle Ostia, not to mention the city itself, is filled with countless foreign spies. I assume he thinks it will be easier to speak freely here.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: But...wouldn't leaving Ostia generate even more attention?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: He's traveling in secret with very few attendants. He's skilled at this sort of thing. There's no need to worry.

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: How unconventional. It must run in the family.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: ...And what exactly is that supposed to mean?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Nothing. I'm very much looking forward to meeting him.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Nils, are you well? You seem...distant.

intro.speaker: Nils
intro.line: I'm fine. Just a little tired. If we can sit still for one night, I'll be bet...ter...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: No! Nils!? Nils!!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Nils!?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Nils! You all right?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Nils!! Open your eyes!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Ninian! Calm down!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Let's move him into the back room and call a healer.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: You mustn't move him!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Huh?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Ninian?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: I'm sorry, I... Um... Please, just for now... Don't move him.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: But...

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Please...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...Let's do as Ninian says. She must have her reasons.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...Please, just one night's rest... That should...make things right.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: If it's going to make him feel better, fine. Whatever you do, don't move him. I'll let the others know.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Lord Hector.......My apologies.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: No worries.

intro.speaker: Eubans
intro.line: ...So this is where the Pheraen noble and his friends are, eh?

intro.speaker: Heath
intro.line: Yes, Commander Eubans.

intro.speaker: Eubans
intro.line: Very well, Heath, your unit will attack from west of the fortress. Your mission is to put an end to the entire group. Make no mistakes.

intro.speaker: Heath
intro.line: ...Are you serious? Marquess Laus abandoned us and just vanished. We've no reason to engage this group.

intro.speaker: Eubans
intro.line: We answered Marquess Laus's call, and we will honor our duty. Regardless, we cannot remain in Lycia any longer. We rebelled against Ostia, and our entire mercenary force is hunted... If we take their heads, we can join the Black Fang in Bern.

intro.speaker: Heath
intro.line: I'm opposed to this plan. There are women and children in their group. What you would ask of us... It's something no knight... no man could do without shame.

intro.speaker: Eubans
intro.line: Listen well, Heath. You're a wanted man, a fugitive from Bern. How about we take you and hand you over to Bern's wyvern riders? We might even be knighted as a reward, given honest work.

intro.speaker: Eubans
intro.line: Hah! Thought as much. Everyone wants to protect his own skin. Now, get your unit together. We attack!!

intro.speaker: Soldier
intro.line: Sir! We're under attack! It's the east gate! The foe is already inside!

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Blast! They would show up now.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: We can't move Nils. Let's try and hold them off! Protect Nils! Don't let them near him!

battle.speaker: Isadora
battle.line: You're Tactician, correct? Lord Eliwood has told me much about you. I'm a knight in service to House Pherae. My name is Isadora. I'm under your command. Please instruct me.

battle.speaker: Wil
battle.line: Shall I join the battle this time, Mark? I can’t wait! Ah, this brings back memories, doesn’t it? Kind of like we’re back with Lyndis’s Legion again. OK, Mark! Guide my arrows true!

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: Lord Hector! We’ll serve as your reinforcements. We’re a small group, and we’ve some mercenaries among us. Rath of Sacae! Take charge of the mercenaries!

battle.speaker: Soldier
battle.line: Hear me!! We’re here to protect Lord Hector, Lord Eliwood, and Lady Lyndis!

recruit-talk.speaker: Rath
recruit-talk.line: ...So you're being hunted again, are you, Lyn of the Lorca?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Rath! Rath of the Kutolah! Well met! What are you doing here?

recruit-talk.speaker: Rath
recruit-talk.line: ...After we parted company, I've made my way as a mercenary here.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: I see... You haven't changed at all. It's...good to see you again.

recruit-talk.speaker: Rath
recruit-talk.line: ...Do you need my help?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Are you offering?

recruit-talk.speaker: Rath
recruit-talk.line: ...You...If you desire it.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Yes, please! Lend us your strength! We're...involved in something terribly dangerous!

recruit-talk.speaker: Rath
recruit-talk.line: I see. When this is finished, I will end my service to this place.

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: Do you command this group?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Who are you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I'm Heath, a wyvern rider serving Eubans's mercenaries. I wish to surrender.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Surrender? Why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I've no wish to harm women and children. I'm a soldier, but... I'm trying to be human, too.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: ...I understand. However, as you know, we're under attack. It will be hard to guarantee your safety.

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: No, that's fine. I will fight alongside you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Yet...

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I will stop Commander Eubans when the moment comes... With this, my lance.

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: Do you command this group?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Who are you to ask?

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I'm Heath, a wyvern rider serving Eubans's mercenaries.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: In that case, you're my enemy. You're gutsy, aren't you? Prepare yourself!

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: Hold. I've not come to fight you. I wish to surrender to your group.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Surrender?

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I've no wish to harm women and children. I'm a soldier, but... I'm trying to be human, too.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: ...You're an odd one. Right, well. We could use all the help we can get. You'll fight under my command.

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: Understood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: You're...a woman?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: What!? Underestimate me, and you'll find you die regretting it! Now come, if you've the nerve!

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: Hold, I am not here to fight you. I'd sooner surrender.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Surrender? You're giving up? Why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I've no wish to harm women and children.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: ......I understand. We're no army. I won't hold you prisoner. If you're not going to fight, go someplace where you'll be safe. However, you are welcome to join us and fight at our side. We're trying to protect a sick child traveling with us.

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I see...and I will help you protect this child.

recruit-talk.speaker: Ninian
recruit-talk.line: Ah...

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: A girl... This place is dangerous, you should flee quickly.

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: ...Wait! Do you know the commander of these forces?

recruit-talk.speaker: Ninian
recruit-talk.line: Ah...Yes...

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: Then deliver a message for me, please. I am Heath, a wyvern rider in Eubans's mercenaries. Tell him I want to join your group. I will fight with you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Ninian
recruit-talk.line: Wait... Why?

recruit-talk.speaker: Heath
recruit-talk.line: I've no wish to harm women and children.

boss.speaker: Eubans
boss.line: …I didn’t imagine they were this capable… Heh! Still, I won’t lose! I live and breathe the air of war! I can’t be beaten!

boss.speaker: Eubans
boss.line: No regrets... My life...and death...are my own!

boss.speaker: Enemy Soldier
boss.line: Commander Eubans has gone down… Uh… Sound the retreat!! We’ve no more reason to fight!!

boss.speaker: Eubans
boss.line: You are a traitor, Heath. You know nothing of honor!

boss.speaker: Heath
boss.line: I... No. I simply must live a life of which I am not ashamed. Commander Eubans... It is not too late. Give the order to stop. If you do...

boss.speaker: Eubans
boss.line: Ha ha... You're so naive! You're no knight. And you're no mercenary, either, you dolt! You know nothing! You can carry your precious morals straight to the grave!

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: So, brother, you're alive after all. You were so long gone that I feared you dead. Another day, and I might have arranged you a funeral rite.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: ...My apologies. Been a little busy.

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: Yes...Leila's final report covered much. ...Eliwood. I am sorry about Lord Elbert. I was powerless to help.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: No... Nothing could have been done. ...More importantly, do you know of Nergal?

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: Only what was reported to me. He appeared a year ago and seized control of the Black Fang. Then he ensnared Laus in a plot of rebellion against Ostia. I can't see what he's after...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: The dragons that vanished after the Scouring... He wants to...bring them back again.

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: What!? Can that be done?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Yes. Let me explain.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: This has even got my brother brooding. He's always been a firm believer in quick decisions. Yet he wishes for more time...that's never happened before.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: ...It's gone from a simple rebellion to a threat to the human race. We saw it with our own eyes, and yet... It's all so unbelievable.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Yet...it's all true.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Yes. I wonder what will happen next. Ideally, we could bring the whole of our lands together to fight as one. It would be a return to the time of the Scouring...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: However, this all hinges on the existence of dragons themselves. Unless dragons are seen in the skies, I doubt anyone will believe us.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Right. And once the dragons are here it'll be too late.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: We must stop all of this now. And we're the only ones who know enough to do it!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Right!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: I agree.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: There we have it! Come on, let's speak to my brother!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Tactician. Ninian. Will you go with us?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Ye-Yes...

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: I would sooner not place this burden on your shoulders alone. And yet, I can see no other choice before me. Listen, my brother... Eliwood, Lyndis, are you determined to act on your resolve?

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Yes, we're prepared.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Me, too... I don't care for sitting back, waiting for others to act.

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: And you, Tactician. My brother and his friends are in your debt. What role will you play? Will you help them? See them through their coming trials? ...I see. Then I have no more to say. I will aid you as much as I can. ...Good luck to you all. ...And what of the girl? The one we spoke of earlier?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Oh, Ninian.

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: It... It's an honor to meet you, Marquess Ostia...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Both Ninian and her brother, Nils, possess a special power.

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: Is that so? Then I would ask you. Do you know where Nergal is at this moment?

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Yes, I can sense him... To the east... He is...very far.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: East... Is he targeting Bern next?

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: That bodes ill. Bern is a powerful and militant country. If Nergal ensnares it... We're done for.

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: ...There's still time. He is still... very weak...... Now... We must act......

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: So, Nergal can't act right away, is that it? Yet, what can we...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: We've no choice but to depart for Bern.

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: ...If there's time, make your destination Missur.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Missur!? That's the wrong direction!

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: Go to the Nabata desert... You may find aid there.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: What do you mean?

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: Go and meet the living legend.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Living...legend?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Well, we’re going, Brother.

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: ...Hm, take care of yourself. And Marquess Pherae, too. You must be Eliwood’s support and strength.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: I know. This has all gotten so out of hand. Still, it’s not entirely hopeless. Lord Elbert’s death need not be in vain. We won’t lose.

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: You’re beginning to sound reasonable...

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Hey!

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: What is it?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Your coloring. You don’t look so good. Is something wrong?

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: ...I just heard a tale that would frighten anyone. When I think that the future rests on the shoulders of a man like you, who lives so haphazardly, I realize that my life’s been too short.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Bah! Is that any way to be? And I was worried about you, too!

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: You should get going. Your friends are waiting.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Ha ha... Pardon my overlong visit. I will take my leave of you then! Most honored elder brother!

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: Hector!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: What is it?

end.speaker: Uther
end.line: Remember, I have not given you permission to die. Heed the orders of your marquess and return to me alive.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Mm. I’ll bring you a tale you won’t believe. Mark my words, Brother. I shall return!
